roleset.name: remove a phosphate group from an organic compound by hydrolysis

example.name: dephosphorylate-v: passivized, with product of the reaction
example.text: Regarding the relationship between adenosine and ATP, ]intracellular adenosine is dephosphorylated from AMP by cytosolic 5'-nucleotidase and is converted back to AMP via adenosine kinase (ADK).
example.arg: Regarding the relationship between adenosine and ATP,

example.name: dephosphorylate-v: agent and instrument
example.text: For cloning, we dephosphorylate the RNAs with shrimp nuclease and deproteinate the reaction with proteinase K, followed by phenol/chloroform extraction.

example.name: dephosphorylation-n
example.text: Dephosphorylation of the 5' end prohibits self-ligation, enabling the researcher to manipulate the DNA as desired before re-ligating.

roleset.note: DEPHOSPHORYLATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.
